title: Stream: Porcelain Raft – Strange Weekend
content:
After a host of mightily impressive EP’s, Brooklyn based Porcelain Raft is set to release his debut long player, Strange Weekend via Secretly Canadian.

Out on 23 January, it’s a wonderfully entrancing record, traversing the warm, languid slopes of idyllic dream-pop and emotionally fraught songwriting. Documenting the travels of Mauro Remiddi, it’s a stirringly personal listen, with each track letting slip just a little more of his epic journey through life. Stream the entirety of Strange Weekend below and pre-order here.

via Hypem
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
